actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Lubricious Plumage
special_abilities.desc: Its skin exudes an oil that permeates its plumage. The moon weaver can't be restrained by magical or nonmagical webbing and it ignores all movement restrictions caused by webbing.
